name: AnarCoin
description: Official Power to the People Token !,,! AnarCoin is Destined to finance Anarchist dream of reversing power, giving it to the People. It will finance the development of a blockchain voting ecosystem used to interact with the population teaching with social onchain networks Dapps and web3 Anarchist propaganda. Adds, games, stuff to read, coinbase like questions that pay for learning, etc... Destined to teach and implicate everyone in politics. Being able to vote as often as needed in order to run state from the bottom up using smart contracts, a crypto wallet and adapted Anarchic Ecosystem destined to replace goverment by popular direct implication in every decision, if needed and giving anyone the possibility to offer alternatives to political or ecological problems: Anarco-Collectivism. Profits generated buy the AnArK Token will be used to create this utopiste and ideological anarco-collectivist project and revolutionairy Dream! A model for the whole world... Shall we start?
